alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued November 23 at 3:08PM HST until November 25 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .A very large north, mid-period swell will build tonight into Thanksgiving Day. This swell will produce surf reaching warning level heights along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Maui through Thursday night. The swell coincides with strong to gale force northeast winds, as well as the spring high tide during the early morning hours on both Thursday and Friday. There could be significant overwash issues and large wave run up along north facing shorelines as a result. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 20 to 25 feet along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Maui. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui. Areas exposed to north swells on other shorelines should see a significant rise in surf. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous. Significant overwash and large wave run up may bring coastal flooding and damage.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
